entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new ignores global.json file #21897
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml issue with .NET Fx WS-Fed replies. #21891
  • Freestyle Jenkins msBuild command #21893
  • Specifying both -f ... and -r ... to dotnet build fails to restore if multiple frameworks are present in the project file #21877
  • on win-arm64, Upgrade failed from net 6 RC1 to RC2 with error The installation path for ARM64 SDK installations: "C:\Program Files\dotnet" cannot be the same as for x64 SDK installations: "C:\Program Files\dotnet" #21872

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix 1ES image name #21895
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable signing of tools host on mac #21894
    6.0.1xx
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21885
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1410823 #21913
    Area-Infrastructure
